message: We created a page to answer some stupid user questions, and it's kind of turned into a page with attempted humor.

Feedback is mostly positive so far, but the sample size is tiny. Our parents and brothers. Wait, our brothers hated it. Just our parents. And mostly because they don't understand English, so as long as we make funny noises, they'll laugh at anything.
Do you find the page funny? Could we use this page to help spread Panabee instead of buying ads? Here is the page: http://www.panabee.com/panabee. Would love some social media feedback!
Or more broadly, please comment on which companies have successfully combined social media + humor for marketing purposes.
@panabee Mailchimp is an email marketing company that always has a lighthearted mood in their blog posts and facebook updates, and even in the users' admin panel.
